website_summaries.verdict: The best budget printer from Xerox with full color, laser printing and USB memory capabilities.
pros: Built-in USB port can read USB sticks to print files directly from the memory
Full color printing renders quick and accurate results
Installs quickly with a typical driver download
cons: 250-sheet capacity is smaller than many office printers and may require more frequent refills

customer_reviews.title: Prints beautiful colors fast
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors. The toner is expensive but worth it for what we would have paid in having our menus printed. This allows us to change prices and menu items quickly and print more copies quickly. Printing is pretty fast for a color laser. This is so much better than a color inkjet! The printer is a little larger than our other black and white laser printers but not as big as other colors lasers we've had in the past. So far it has worked like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Photo quality poor.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my small business. Prints great on plain laser paper. Tried to print photos on Xerox® Bold DigitalTM Coated Satin Printing Paper, Letter Size, 94 Brightness, 80 Lb Text...They look horrible. Botchy and fuzzy images. I've tried different settings and searching online for a fix to no avail. Buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Lea A.

customer_reviews.title: The worst printer I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This printer deserves 0 stars. I have had two and neither has lasted a year. The first one had 3 drums start failing in less that 9 months, and only had printed about 400 pages, I never even had to buy toner for it. With the price of the drums it was cheaper to buy the whole printer again. This one lasted almost a year. One of the drums failed, and now it just refuses to see the network at all. I thought that Xerox was a good brand. I guess I will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: dead after 14 months
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in Sept 2017, shortly after that, the printer broke but xerox did fix it free, although it did take about a month or so. Now, 14 months later, it is dead and i have to pay $299 for a service call for the first 30 min and $65 every 15 min after. i didnt even pay $300 for the printer to begin with. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Jared J

customer_reviews.title: Worst Idea I ever had...
customer_reviews.text: It is sitting in the box. I had to buy the $50 piece to make it wireless. The toner I bought from 2 different sellers does not work in it. I have a useless printer now, I do not recommend this product. Think Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Grazioso

customer_reviews.title: It's a work horse.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer value. High quality output and very few jams with good paper. Menus could be better. After-market cartridges work well. Easy setup on mixed win/mac network.
customer_reviews.author: iadude

customer_reviews.title: awesome printer
customer_reviews.text: works awesome. so much better than the cheap ink jets
customer_reviews.author: weasel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn Good!
customer_reviews.text: Took some getting used to, Admin password is "1111", necessary to change default paper size to 8x11, otherwise always defaults to A6. Print is very nice. Seems to burn through toner doing images though.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry_D

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest piece of junk I have ever used, and possibly why it was half off? Difficult setup, antiquated user features, jams constantly, and has terrible support!
customer_reviews.author: David Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty printer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome printer. Prints are perfect, clean and fast. Took a while to set up without wifi but everything worked great afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: If you want a printer for 1 year and that is it, the product is ok.
customer_reviews.text: The printer quit working after a year with minimal use. One day it repeatedly started frequently shutting itself down. I would not recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer For my Business
customer_reviews.text: I use it with 2 part perforated paper to print receipts. It is faster and cheaper than an Ink Jet Printer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Problems from day one.
customer_reviews.text: Xerox did send a repair man out to put an new fusser in but it did not fix all my problems with the machine. very disappointed with the printer and xerox. I have had it about 9 months and the prints are so bad I am now shopping for a new printer. It won't be a xerox!
customer_reviews.author: Kreig Adkins

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the printer I need. Ordered and returned 2 others. this one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anarchy Now

customer_reviews.title: Big but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is like the most incredible printer that I have ever owned in my life pictures come out perfect laser color is definitely the way to go
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Maui Waui

customer_reviews.title: it was easy setting up and good quality of print
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item during lightening sale. When drag this item home, it realized that it was made in Vietnam. I was a little concerns. Once I setup and test print a few pages, it was easy setting up and good quality of print. It looks all good. I meant perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Lei Lu

customer_reviews.title: Thought Xerox woukd have been a good choice. I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: Printer has printed 3 pages in almost a month. Every time it starts up I get 042-335 error. Should have went with another brand. Thought Xerox woukd have been a good choice. I was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: S Dub

customer_reviews.title: So far this printer has been exactly what they've advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this printer has been exactly what they've advertised if you only need to print. Wish I would of bought one that scanned too though.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than i thought and really heavy but man this ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than i thought and really heavy but man this prints faster than the printers at my office. Outstanding job Xerox. Solid for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Marc S

customer_reviews.title: Paper jams!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for three weeks- now the paper jams constantly. Help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: I agree it's lame that they require a separate WiFi module but I don't need it. I'm using the printer wired on my network. Print speed, quality and first-page time are excellent. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Garv

customer_reviews.title: nothing but problems. have not had it even a ...
customer_reviews.text: nothing but problems. have not had it even a week and it continues to have paper jams. Very frustrating - will likely return to the cheap inkjets.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Ink Last A LONG Time! No Jams.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this printer. Colors are crisp. I have printer over 100 8.5x11 full color pages and still have ink. I used copy paper, Avery sticker paper , and Card stock and never had one jam. Those giving one star for not being wireless need to read the description. It does not come wireless but you can make it wireless with a plug in for about $50.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mom

customer_reviews.title: Haven't gotten it working yet. Need to call in ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten it working yet. Need to call in someone and not sure it works as advertised to print with Iphone without another part.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Bloom

customer_reviews.title: 5200 print sheets the printer was made in 2015 and ...
customer_reviews.text: 5200 print sheets the printer was made in 2015 and the soft were did not seam to work.
customer_reviews.author: curtis riese

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: To replace the toner is about $119 per color! This thing does nothing except print. It does not copy. It does not scan. It does not fax....and it's huge. Worst thing I've ever purchased. It's going in the trash today, (Actually I will probably recycle it, but you get my point.) Also, when I ordered new ink I was sent the wrong ink. Apparently this printer has two ink types - they don't tell you that when you buy it.. I hate this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Annoying that there are no instructions. False advertisement about the printer being wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Tasker

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless out of the box!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not wireless out of the box. Come on Xerox! It's 2017! I have to buy a $55 wireless adapter now for wireless connectivity..... And the setup guide is absolutely horrible. I downloaded the user manual from the web. Was hoping for better. I'll update if I ever get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Bad Experience with Faulty Printer
customer_reviews.text: After printing few hundred pages, it gave error code and stopped printing. I contacted their customer support and they sent a technician. He had no clue, spent all day at my home. Finally said he can’t fix it. Now need to get back to them and force them to take it back. Ended up buying a different laser printer. Very bad experience. Based on this experience, I wouldn’t recommend Xerox products.
customer_reviews.author: Vineeth V

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not awesome...
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is good, but I have to keep unplugging it so it can restart and be seen on the network. When it restarts, it prints a test page automatically. Since I was printing on legal size paper, the printer would jam because apparently the test page can only print on letter size paper. After clearing the jam, the computer still saw the printer as offline from the jam, causing me to have to reset it again. Frustrating...
customer_reviews.author: Greg A Taunt

customer_reviews.title: The worst printer I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The worst printer I have ever owned. Paper jams. There is always a problem with this printer. I thought because of the name XEROX, I was expecting a really good product, but man was I disappointed. So frustrated with it, I have it as a paper weight and will get rid of it. Should went with HP, as I had originally intended.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pierre Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great printer at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fast and clear printing. Easy to set up, AirPrint is very convenient. I have had it almost a year and have not needed to replace the ink it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Azsunny77

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT PRINT WIRELESSLY
customer_reviews.text: A huge part of the description of this printer is a total lie. First line states......"Print directly from popular mobile devices using Apple® AirPrint®, Mopria®, Google Cloud PrintTM, Wi-Fi Direct* and Xerox® Print Service Plug-In for Android." Guess what? This printer doesnt support ANY of those things without buying an add on adapter. Prints are good looking, so Ill give it that.....but Amazon either needs to correct their false descriptions and start giving out free adapters (or start refunding money).
customer_reviews.author: J. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Heat Press
customer_reviews.text: Can this be use to to print out on heat press paper and use with heat press machine and do I have to change ink if so.
customer_reviews.author: franklin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a good one paper jam every time you try to print something
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality printer.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Really quick printing from sleep. Sharp pictures. It is larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: attempting to print even a pixel of blue turns the entire page a solid purple
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Xerox Phaser 6510/N Color Laser Printer
product_meta.description: Style:PrinterThe Xerox Phaser 6510 meets the demand for a printer that connects with mobile devices while simultaneously delivering outstanding color prints. Whether you’re outputting snapshots from your smart phone or Photoshop files from a tablet or PC, it delivers 1200 X 2400 dpi resolution and PANTONE color matching. This model does not have wireless connectivity, you must add the Wireless Network Adapter for this function (497K16750) Connectivity: 10/100/1000 Based Ethernet, USB 3.0. Wireless connectivity can be setup with adapter sold seperately (497K16750)
feature_bullets: Print directly from popular mobile devices using Apple AirPrint, Mopria, Google Cloud Print, Wi-Fi Direct* and Xerox Print Service Plug-In for Android.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars50 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
